data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I actually am quite willing to change the namespace.

    Basically I need a namespace for a suite of modules that provide
    the ability to automatically abstract a SQL database.

    Automatic::DB Automatic::DB::Datum Automatic::DB::Metadata
    Automatic::DB::Cached_sth Automatic::DB::Autoloader
